howToUse.title: How to Use

step1.title: Add QR Code Data:
step1.description: Use the "QR Code Data" tab to manually add entries or import from a CSV file. Each entry can be either a link or an email message.

step2.title: Configure Template:
step2.description: Switch to the "PDF Template" tab to customize the layout, including page size, QR code position, and text formatting.

step3.title: Generate PDF:
step3.description: Click the "Generate PDF" button in the top right to create your printable PDF with all QR codes.

howToUse.localStorageNote: All data is stored locally in your browser. Your data will persist between sessions.

pdfTemplateDesigner.description: Use the visual designer below to customize your PDF template. Drag and drop elements, resize them, and configure their properties.
